mapper.insert: insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE()); insert INTO POST_FILE_TBL (POST_IDX, FILE_IDX) values (#{post_idx}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
mapper.select: select POST_IDX, MEM_ID, POST_TTL, POST_DATE, POST_HIT_CNT from POST_TBL where POST_TTL like CONCAT('%', #{post_ttl}, '%') limit #{offset}, 10;
select PT.POST_IDX, PT.MEM_ID, PT.POST_TTL, PT.POST_DATE, PT.POST_HIT_CNT from POST_TBL PT inner join POST_TAG_TBL PTT on PT.POST_IDX = PTT.POST_IDX where PTT.TAG_NM = '태그이름' limit N, 10;
